sentences.en: A black cloudburst was drenching Siena at midday.
sentences.cn: 中午,一场天昏地暗的暴风雨在锡耶纳上空倒下来.

sentences.en: A dramatic cloudburst releases jagged bolts of lightning deep into the Grand Canyon near Point Sublime.
sentences.cn: 突发的倾盆大雨向崇敬角附近的大峡谷深处释放了一道锯齿状闪电。

sentences.en: A patch of red cloudburst over the horizon , blood - red, and glowing.
sentences.cn: 天边绽出一小片红霞,血红、发亮.

sentences.en: All of a sudden a storm broke – a cloudburst.
sentences.cn: 突然暴风雨来临了—一场常见的大暴雨.

sentences.en: All of a sudden a storm broke – a regular cloudburst.
sentences.cn: 突然暴风雨来临了—一场常见的大暴雨。

sentences.en: But today, we had a quick cloudburst, and now my plants are looking vibrant!
sentences.cn: 但今天, 下了一次快雨, 我种的东西现在看起来非常滋润.

sentences.en: The bus was delayed by a cloudburst.
sentences.cn: 由于大暴雨,公共汽车来迟了.

sentences.en: The cloudburst masterplan for Copenhagen, the capital of Denmark, is an example of an ambitious effort to protect the city against future heavy rain events.
sentences.cn: 作为此方面的典范，丹麦首都哥本哈根市的暴雨防控规划提出了一套雄心勃勃的计划，旨在帮助城市免受未来的暴雨之害。

sentences.en: These poured down as though there had been a sudden cloudburst.
sentences.cn: 这些石头倾泻而下,仿佛是一场突然的大暴雨.
